info.description: Backend API For the Auth/User Service
info.title: Auth/User API

get.summary: Refresh the expired jwt authentication by issuing a token refresh request and returns theupdated response tokens
Logs the user in to the system and return the auth tokens and some other data

post.summary: Register new user, then log them in. If succeed return the auth tokens and some other data

get.summary: Returns all users/ clients that's currently inside the specified queue.This endpoint can only be hit by a queue owner.

post.summary: Add a client to a queue, if succeed will return newly created client with userId set to -1Lbecause no registered user is associated with it. Because of that client added to a queue this way will notbe notify about queue changes via websocket. This endpoint can only be hit by a queue owner.

delete.summary: Remove an unwanted user from a queue.If succeed or no record found with the specified id, will return success message.This endpoint can only be hit by a queue owner.

get.summary: Return a QR-Code PNG image that contains a url to the queue specified by the path variable

post.summary: Create a new queue and return the created queue along with it stats data from queue_stats table.

get.summary: Return all guest readable detail about this queue, this route is meant for unauthorized guest. Not secured by default.

post.summary: Join a queue, if succeed return all information about a queue you just joined

get.summary: Logs the specified user device and clears the refresh tokens associated with it

access_token.description: access token needed to access secured resources

device_token.description: device token generated by firebase on client, this token is unique to each device and can be use to send notification via FCM.

ip_address.description: IP address send from client at signup/ signup, this will be use to get the user creator location. Location is needed to make sure a user that want to join a queue can only join at a reasonable radius

location.description: user's location determined from ip address

refresh_token.description: refresh token to refresh access token when expired

Authentication Response.title: Authentication Response
Authentication Response.description: API response when a user is authenticated

success.description: true if an operation is performed successfully, false otherwise

Common API Response.title: Common API Response
Common API Response.description: A default API response used in multiple endpoints

In Queue Response DTO.title: In Queue Response DTO
In Queue Response DTO.description: A model contains information about a user/ client in a queue

InQueue Request DTO.title: InQueue Request DTO
InQueue Request DTO.description: Payload to request all users inside a queue

access_token.description: access token needed to access secured resources

refresh_token.description: refresh token to refresh access token when expired

JWT Authentication Response.title: JWT Authentication Response
JWT Authentication Response.description: Returns by API when a token is successfully refreshed

ip_address.description: IP address send from client at signup/ signup, this will be use to get the user creator location. Location is needed to make sure a user that want to join a queue can only join at a reasonable radius

Join Queue Request DTO.title: Join Queue Request DTO
Join Queue Request DTO.description: The data required from user in order to join a queue.

client_contact.description: the client's contact in a queue

client_name.description: the client's name in a queue

client_num.description: the client's number in a queue

increment_by.description: how many users/ clients are served at once

is_closed_queue.description: queue can only be joined by id, or search-able

queue_state.description: state of a queue in enum

Join Queue Response.title: Join Queue Response
Join Queue Response.description: Response return by API when a user successfully joined a queue.

New Queue Request DTO.title: New Queue Request DTO
New Queue Request DTO.description: The data required in order to create new queue.

current_in_queue.description: count of users/ clients currently in a queue

incremented_by.description: how many users/ clients are served at once

is_closed_queue.description: queue can only be joined by id, or search-able

state.description: state of a queue in enum

id.description: id of in queue to remove

Remove From In Queue Request DTO.title: Remove From In Queue Request DTO
Remove From In Queue Request DTO.description: Paylod to request a user/ client removal from an in queue.

device_token.description: device token generated by firebase on client, this token is unique to each device and can be use to send notification via FCM.

email.description: User's email. this is a natural id

ip_address.description: IP address send from client at signup/ signup, this will be use to get the user creator location. Location is needed to make sure a user that want to join a queue can only join at a reasonable radius

SignoutRequest Payload.title: SignoutRequest Payload
SignoutRequest Payload.description: Request to log out a single device owned by a user

device_token.description: device token generated by firebase on client, this token is unique to each device and can be use to send notification via FCM.

email.description: User's email. this is a natural id

ip_address.description: IP address send from client at signup/ signup, this will be use to get the user creator location. Location is needed to make sure a user that want to join a queue can only join at a reasonable radius

name.description: Full name of the user, this is not unique

Signup Request DTO.title: Signup Request DTO
Signup Request DTO.description: The data required from user in order to register

refresh_token.description: Valid refresh token passed during earlier successful authentications

Token refresh Request.title: Token refresh Request
Token refresh Request.description: The jwt token refresh request payload
